description:
A cross-platform desktop application for downloading and managing your Audible audiobooks.

Say goodbye to the hassle of managing your audiobooks across multiple devices. With OpenAudible, you can easily download, view, and manage all your Audible books in one place. Our lightning-fast conversion to MP3 and M4B audio formats makes it easy to enjoy your favorite books on any device. Plus, our automation features make it a breeze to update your library after buying new books.
fixed locate library dialog
improved performance of library scanning (for NAS users)
Fixed podcast download issue
Improved dialog for deleting missing files
Added paste button to license dialog
Created portable version for Windows
reduce full library scan frequency
